alert.note: Alert for Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 5:53PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Madison, southeastern Cook, south central Berrien, Lanier, Lowndes and central Brooks Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 553 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles north of Quitman to Blue Springs. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Park, Lakeland, Valdosta, Quitman, Hahira, Ray City, I-75 At Exit 16, Moody Air Force Base, Remerton, Meigs, Dasher, Morven, Cecil, Barretts, New Lois, Pinetta, Hansell, Clyattville, Hanson and I-75 At Exit 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
